title: evil robot.apk
description:
An Experiment carried out by a Mad Scientist to make world's most powerful TERROR MACHINE has finally completed. He has completed his first Evil Robot successfully. You are the only one who could pilot this Evil Robot.
Military will try to defeat you,kill them all,Level the ground with your fury and  show no mercy.Lots of games to become a Hero. Come be a Super Villain for the first time...
Evil Robot is the Top 2D Shooter game,Play Evil Robot and Shoot everything that comes in your path.
Your Evil Robot now in Christmas Mood,play the Christmas version.
Merry Christmas and a Happy New Year.

Evil Robot
                     is comming...

Features
--------------
1. Breathtaking Graphics
A 2D shooting game with Experience the action in stunning graphics! Witness the dazzling display of Robot's unique skills!

2. Collection of orbs! 
Beautiful balls with extreme power will be parachuted!

3. Endless Fun! 
An endless game is much more fun than ending,Kill and move as far as possible with these heavy terror machine!

4. Rocking Guns 
Unleash your Robot or the Mega Bots fury with our 50 Caliber guns, Rocket Launchers and Laser Shots!
